Touch Action

# Touch Action

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
touch-auto
```          | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-none
```          | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-x
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-left
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-right
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-y
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-up
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-down
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-pinch-zoom	
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
touch-manipulation	
``` | 🌐 Web only |
